intro: Verbascum haussknechtii var. degenii, commonly known as the Degen's mullein, is a rare and endemic plant species native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. It belongs to the family Scrophulariaceae and is characterized by its tall, hairy stems and large, showy yellow flowers.
